elemental_tetris.title: ❓What is Element Tetris?❓
elemental_tetris.description:
The total % across elements must add up to the specified amount to nullify damage.

Ex. Dark Espers Scorn: Requires 400% Fire/Wind/Water/Dark to survive turns 5/10/15/etc.

100% Fire / 50% Wind / 50% Water / 200% Dark = 400% total, ✅success!
400% Fire / 0% Wind / 0% Water / 0% Dark = 400% total, ✅success!
80% Fire / 20% Wind / 20% Water / 70% Dark = 190% total, ❌fail!

👉All party members need all resists.
👉Buffs and imperils work. Buffing 70% all element resist will only require 120% Fire/Wind/Water/Dark.

1⃣Dark Espers Scorn: 400% Fire/Wind/Water/Dark and 420% Fire/Water/Dark
2⃣Ultros/Typhon Scorn: 100% Lightning, 50% Fire, 20% Earth/Water/Wind
3⃣Lich: 50+% Fire/Ice/Lightning
4⃣Glacial Scorn: 380% Ice/Water/Wind

👉[See Furcula's post for more information.](https://bit.ly/2L54eY4)

new_player_info.title: New Player Info
new_player_info.description:
One team can't do everything, you'll need specific setups for each encounter
Story is very easy, take any 5 units you want
Do not sell any 3* or higher units, ever
Do not fuse any 5* units together, ever
Do not buy magic keys
Do not use tickets on the "Rare Summon" banner at the very bottom
Avoid lapis reviving if you die
Avoid NRG refreshing with lapis (buy the NRG daily if you must)
Avoid doing the 500 lapis single pull
Do not use max-level King Metal Cactuars on non-7* units
5* Ashe and Lightning are guaranteed, free units. They are sufficient for story content. Ashe is normally a 4* base unit.
Friend units have a 3 hour cooldown
